title.rendered: PROFESSIONAL AIRCRAFT ACCESSORIES ADDS CRJ1000 LANDING GEAR OVERHAUL CAPABILITY

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories announced it has added landing gear overhaul for Bombardier CRJ1000 NextGen regional jets to its capabilities.

The CRJ1000 NextGen is the largest member of the CRJ series of regional jets. Professional Aircraft Accessories has been providing service and overhauls for the CRJ regional market including the CRJ 200/550/700 and 900 aircraft for nearly 20 years.

“We are thrilled to add the CRJ 1000 NextGen landing gear to our repertoire of capabilities,” said Tonya Wondolowski, director of sales and business development for Professional Aircraft Accessories. “We are extremely experienced in this series of landing gear. In fact, our launch customer for this overhaul selected us because of that expertise and our exceptional turn- times.”

Professional Aircraft Accessories is currently in the process of completing its third CRJ1000 NextGen set for Air Nostrum, also known as Iberia Regional, a Spanish regional airline based in Valencia. Professional Aircraft Accessories also provides PMA capabilities, Approved Repair Schemes, service and overhaul for other models of aircraft including commercial, military and business aircraft.
